title: I got perm ban
body:
Hey.. I'm pretty sorry I was just mad, I really want to play league its been long time I didn't play and 14 days ban is a lot tbh you could just give me 1 or 2 days ban this is a lot, I really don't play anything except league and I'm bored everyday

please reply soon :* lota love :DDDD

replies.body: Went ahead and looked at your chats. Neither of the conversations are okay and telling another player to KYS is worthy of a two week ban. If you continue down this road you'll lose the entire account and all content within it. Best to mute all players if you can't talk in a positive manner to your team.
